text: Macellibacteroides fermentans is a non-spore-forming, obligately anaerobic, rod-shaped and mesophilic bacterium from the genus of Macellibacteroides which has been isolated from an upflow anaerobic filter fore treating abattoir wastewaters in Tunisia. == References == == External links == *Type strain of Macellibacteroides fermentans at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteroidetes Category:Bacteria described in 2012
title: Macellibacteroides fermentans
